titles.title: A resolution returning to the Senate the bill S. 2763.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/28/1988--Introduced. Expresses the opinion of the House of Representatives that S. 2763, which imposes sanctions and calls for United Nations action against Iraq, contravenes the U.S. Constitution and is an infringement of the privileges of the House. Returns such bill to the Senate.
